common.logoutConfirm: Are you sure you want to logout?
common.networkError: Network error. Please check your connection.
common.tooManyRequests: Too many requests. Try again in {{seconds}} seconds.

phoneInput.title: Enter your phone
phoneInput.subtitle: We'll send you a verification code
phoneInput.wrongAppMessage: This phone number is registered as a {{role}}. Please use the {{appName}} app to login.

otp.title: Verify your phone
otp.subtitle: Enter the 6-digit code sent to
otp.codeSent: A new code has been sent to your phone
otp.helpText: Didn't receive the code? Check your spam folder or try resending

signup.title: Create your Pro account
signup.subtitle: Tell us about yourself and your services
signup.aboutPlaceholder: Describe your professional experience and the services you offer...
signup.referralPlaceholder: Enter code if referred by another provider
signup.validCode: Valid code! You'll receive a bonus when qualified.
signup.nextSteps:
After creating your account, you'll need to:
1. Upload your ID documents
2. Add your services
3. Select your coverage zones
4. Wait for admin approval
signup.accountCreatedMessage: Your account has been created. Complete your profile to get approved.
signup.firstNameError: First name must be at least 2 characters
signup.lastNameError: Last name must be at least 2 characters
signup.bioError: Please describe your services (at least 10 characters)

home.title: Complete Your Profile
home.subtitle: Finish these steps to get your account approved
home.uploadDocumentsDesc: Verify your identity by uploading your ID card
home.addServicesDesc: Select the services you offer and set your prices
home.setZonesDesc: Choose the areas where you provide services
home.setScheduleDesc: Set your weekly availability for appointments
home.readyToSubmit: You're ready to submit your application for review.
home.applicationSubmittedMessage: Your application has been submitted for review. You will be notified once approved.
home.profileComplete: Your profile is 100% complete! Our team is reviewing your application. You'll be notified once approved.
home.rejectedDefaultMessage: Your application was not approved. Please review and update your profile before resubmitting.
home.completeAllSteps: Complete all steps above to submit your application for approval.

documents.title: Upload ID Documents
documents.subtitle: We need to verify your identity to approve your account
documents.tapToUploadFront: Tap to upload front of ID
documents.tapToUploadBack: Tap to upload back of ID
documents.guideline1: Make sure the entire ID is visible
documents.guideline2: Ensure good lighting with no glare
documents.documentsUploadedMessage: Your ID documents have been uploaded and are pending review.
documents.uploadBothSides: Please upload both front and back of your ID
documents.photoPermission: Please allow access to your photos to upload ID documents.
documents.cameraPermission: Please allow access to your camera to take photos.
documents.idVerifiedMessage: Your identity has been verified successfully.
documents.documentsUnderReviewMessage: Your ID documents have been submitted and are being reviewed. You'll be notified once verified.
documents.resubmissionMessage: Admin has requested new documents. Please upload clear photos of your ID.

services.title: Add Services
services.whatToDo: What would you like to do?

pendingApproval.title: Pending Approval
pendingApproval.description: Your account is currently under review. We'll notify you once your account is approved.
pendingApproval.nextDescription: Our team will review your profile, documents, and services. This usually takes 1-2 business days. You'll receive a notification once approved.
pendingApproval.stillUnderReview: Your application is still under review. Please check back later.
pendingApproval.failedToCheck: Failed to check status. Please try again.

accountRejected.title: Account Not Approved
accountRejected.description: Unfortunately, your account was not approved at this time.
accountRejected.defaultReason: Your account did not meet our requirements.
accountRejected.whatCanIDoDesc: Update your profile information and documents, then reapply for approval. You must make at least one change before resubmitting.
accountRejected.tip1: Ensure your ID photos are clear and readable
accountRejected.tip3: Add relevant services with competitive pricing
accountRejected.noChangesMessage: Please update your profile information before resubmitting for review.
accountRejected.reapplyMessage: Are you sure you want to submit your account for review again?
accountRejected.reapplySuccessMessage: Your account has been submitted for review again. We will notify you once a decision is made.
accountRejected.failedToSubmit: Failed to submit for review. Please try again.

online.toggleToAccept: Toggle on to accept instant bookings

actions.assignmentAccepted: Assignment accepted! Discuss scope with customer before sending quote.
actions.assignmentRejected: The booking has been rejected and reassigned.
actions.customerNotified: Customer notified that you are on the way
actions.startRequested: Job start request sent. Waiting for customer confirmation.
actions.completionRequested: Completion request sent. Waiting for customer confirmation.
actions.provideReason: Please provide a reason for rejection
actions.rejectReason: Please provide a reason for rejection:
